Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
-2.2.1.1
    Fix clear cache button in party view.
-2.2.1.0
    Add alliance swapping to the party view.
    Add Chaotic to the default layout.
    Some other small fixes.
-2.2.0.2
    Handle FF Logs API issues more gracefully.
-2.2.0.1
    Add FRU to the default layout.
-2.2.0.0
   API 11 + 7.1 update.
   Update the default layout.
   Add some background improvements.
